00018 PulseCandidateFinder::PulseCandidateFinder(std::string detname, modules::options* opts): fChannel(detname) {
00019 
00020   if (fDefaultParameterValues.empty()) {
00021     SetDefaultParameterValues();
00022   }
00023 
00024   fNSigma = opts->GetInt("n_sigma", 0);
00025   if (fNSigma == 0) {
00026     fParameterValue = opts->GetInt(detname, fDefaultParameterValues[fChannel]); // set the parameter value for this channel
00027   }
00028   else {
00029     if (fOneSigmaValues.empty()) {
00030       SetOneSigmaValues();
00031     }
00032     fParameterValue = fNSigma * fOneSigmaValues[IDs::channel(detname)];
00033   }
00034 
00035   if (opts->HasOption("debug") && (opts->GetOption("debug").empty() || opts->GetBool("debug"))) {
00036     std::cout << "Parameter Value for " << fChannel << " PulseCandidateFinder is " << fParameterValue << std::endl; // would be nice to know which module this is for
00037   }
00038 }
00039 
00042 void PulseCandidateFinder::FindPulseCandidates(TPulseIsland* pulse) {
00043 
00044   // Clear the vector of pulse candidate locations first since it will still contain them from previous pulses
00045   fPulseCandidateLocations.clear();
00046 
00047   fPulseIsland = pulse;
00048 
00049   // We have a different algorithm for fast and slow pulses
00050   if (fChannel.isFast()) {
00051     FindCandidatePulses_Fast(fParameterValue);
00052   }
00053   else if (fChannel.isSlow()) {
00054     FindCandidatePulses_Slow(fParameterValue);
00055   }
00056   else {
00057     // this is a scintillator so do the fast pulse analysis
00058     FindCandidatePulses_Fast(fParameterValue);
00059   }
00060 }

00062 PulseCandidateFinder::~PulseCandidateFinder() {
00063 }
00064 
00067 std::vector<TPulseIsland*> PulseCandidateFinder::GetPulseCandidates() {
00068 
00069   // Get the output ready
00070   std::vector<TPulseIsland*> pulse_candidates;
00071 
00072   // Loop through the pulse candidate locations
00073   for (std::vector<Location>::iterator locationIter = fPulseCandidateLocations.begin(); locationIter != fPulseCandidateLocations.end(); ++locationIter) {
00074     
00075     // Get the start and stop locations
00076     int start_location = (*locationIter).start;
00077     int stop_location = (*locationIter).stop;
00078 
00079     // Get the bank name and work out what the new timestamp will be
00080     std::string bankname = fPulseIsland->GetBankName();
00081     int new_timestamp = fPulseIsland->GetTimeStamp() + start_location;
00082 
00083     // Get the samples from the original TPI and have a new one ready for the pulse candidate
00084     const std::vector<int>& theSamples = fPulseIsland->GetSamples();
00085     std::vector<int> theNewSamples;
00086 
00087     // Loop through the samples between the start and stop locations and add them to the new samples vector
00088     for (int iSample = start_location; iSample <= stop_location; ++iSample) {
00089       theNewSamples.push_back(theSamples.at(iSample));
00090     }
00091 
00092     TPulseIsland* pulse_island = new TPulseIsland(new_timestamp, theNewSamples, bankname);
00093     pulse_candidates.push_back(pulse_island);
00094   }
00095 
00096   return pulse_candidates;
00097 }
00098 
00101 void PulseCandidateFinder::FindCandidatePulses_Fast(int rise) {
00102 
00103   const std::vector<int>& samples = fPulseIsland->GetSamples();
00104   unsigned int n_samples = samples.size();
00105 
00106   std::string bankname = fPulseIsland->GetBankName();
00107   double pedestal = SetupNavigator::Instance()->GetPedestal(bankname);
00108   double noise = SetupNavigator::Instance()->GetPedestalError(bankname);
00109   int polarity = fPulseIsland->GetTriggerPolarity();
00110 
00111   int s1, s2, ds; // this sample value, the previous sample value and the change in the sample value
00112   bool found = false;
00113   Location location;
00114 
00115   // Loop through the samples
00116   int n_border_samples = 10; // take some samples before and after the candidate officially stops
00117   for (unsigned int i = 1; i < n_samples; ++i) {
00118     s1 = polarity * (samples[i-1] - pedestal);
00119     s2 = polarity * (samples[i] - pedestal);
00120     ds = s2 - s1;
00121 
00122     if (found) {
00123 
00124       if (s2 < noise) { // stop if the sample goes below pedestal
00125         location.stop = (int)i + n_border_samples;
00126         if (location.stop >= samples.size()) {
00127           location.stop = samples.size() - 1;
00128         }
00129 
00130         fPulseCandidateLocations.push_back(location);
00131         found = false;
00132       }
00133       
00134       // Also stop if we are at the last sample
00135       if (i == n_samples-1) {
00136         location.stop = (int) i;
00137 
00138         fPulseCandidateLocations.push_back(location);
00139         found = false;
00140       }
00141     } else {
00142       if (ds > rise) {
00143         found = true;
00144         location.start = (int)(i - 1) - n_border_samples;
00145 
00146         if (location.start < 0) {
00147           location.start = 0;
00148         }
00149       }
00150     }
00151   }
00152 }

00156 void PulseCandidateFinder::FindCandidatePulses_Slow(int threshold) {
00157 
00158   const std::vector<int>& samples = fPulseIsland->GetSamples();
00159   unsigned int n_samples = samples.size();
00160 
00161   std::string bankname = fPulseIsland->GetBankName();
00162   double pedestal = SetupNavigator::Instance()->GetPedestal(bankname);
00163   double noise = SetupNavigator::Instance()->GetPedestalError(bankname);
00164   int polarity = fPulseIsland->GetTriggerPolarity();
00165 
00166   int sample_height; // the sample's height above pedestal
00167   int start, stop; // the start and stop location
00168   bool found = false;
00169   Location location;
00170 
00171   // Loop through the samples
00172   int n_border_samples = 10; // take some samples before and after the candidate officially stops
00173   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n_samples; ++i) {
00174     sample_height = polarity * (samples[i] - pedestal);
00175 
00176     if (found) {
00177       if (sample_height < noise) { // stop if the sample goes below pedestal
00178         location.stop = (int)i + n_border_samples;
00179         if (location.stop >= samples.size()) {
00180           location.stop = samples.size() - 1;
00181         }
00182 
00183         start = stop = 0;
00184         fPulseCandidateLocations.push_back(location);
00185         found = false;
00186       }
00187     } else {
00188       if (sample_height > threshold) {
00189         found = true;
00190         location.start = (int)(i) - n_border_samples;
00191         if (location.start < 0) {
00192           location.start = 0;
00193         }
00194       }
00195     }
00196   }
00197 }

00202 void PulseCandidateFinder::FillParameterHistogram(TH1D* histogram) {
00203 
00204   std::string detname = TSetupData::Instance()->GetDetectorName(fPulseIsland->GetBankName());
00205   IDs::channel theChannel = detname;
00206 
00207   std::string parameter_name = "Unknown";
00208 
00209   // We have a different algorithm for fast and slow pulses
00210   if (theChannel.isFast()) {
00211     parameter_name = "SampleDifference";
00212     FillSampleDifferencesHistogram(histogram);
00213   }
00214   else if (theChannel.isSlow()) {
00215     parameter_name = "SampleHeight";
00216     FillSampleHeightsHistogram(histogram);
00217   }
00218   else {
00219     // it's a scintillator so plot the fast parameters
00220     parameter_name = "SampleDifference";
00221     FillSampleDifferencesHistogram(histogram);
00222   }
00223 
00224   std::stringstream histtitle;
00225   histtitle << "Plot of " << parameter_name << " for " << detname << " for Run " << SetupNavigator::Instance()->GetRunNumber();
00226   histogram->SetTitle(histtitle.str().c_str());
00227   histogram->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("");
00228   histogram->GetXaxis()->SetTitle(parameter_name.c_str());
00229 }
00230 
00233 void PulseCandidateFinder::FillSampleDifferencesHistogram(TH1D* histogram) {
00234 
00235   const std::vector<int>& samples = fPulseIsland->GetSamples();
00236   unsigned int n_samples = samples.size();
00237   int pedestal = fPulseIsland->GetPedestal(0);
00238   int polarity = fPulseIsland->GetTriggerPolarity();
00239 
00240   int s1, s2, ds; // this sample value, the previous sample value and the change in the sample value
00241 
00242   // Loop through the samples
00243   for (unsigned int i = 1; i < n_samples; ++i) {
00244     s1 = polarity * (samples[i-1] - pedestal);
00245     s2 = polarity * (samples[i] - pedestal);
00246     ds = s2 - s1;
00247 
00248     histogram->Fill(ds);
00249   }
00250 }

00254 void PulseCandidateFinder::FillSampleHeightsHistogram(TH1D* histogram) {
00255 
00256   const std::vector<int>& samples = fPulseIsland->GetSamples();
00257   unsigned int n_samples = samples.size();
00258   int pedestal = fPulseIsland->GetPedestal(0);
00259   int polarity = fPulseIsland->GetTriggerPolarity();
00260 
00261   int sample_height; // the height of this sample above pedestal
00262 
00263   // Loop through the samples
00264   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n_samples; ++i) {
00265     sample_height = polarity * (samples[i] - pedestal);
00266 
00267     histogram->Fill(sample_height);
00268   }
00269 }

00319 std::map<IDs::channel, double> PulseCandidateFinder::fOneSigmaValues;
00320 
00323 void PulseCandidateFinder::SetOneSigmaValues() {
00324 
00325   // The values that we will read in
00326   std::string run_number;
00327   std::string detname, bankname;
00328   std::string pedestal, noise;
00329 
00330   // Get the SQLite database file
00331   TSQLiteServer* server = new TSQLiteServer("sqlite://pedestals-and-noises.sqlite");
00332 
00333   std::stringstream query; 
00334   std::string tablename = "pedestals_and_noises";
00335   if (server) {
00336 
00337     query << "SELECT * FROM " << tablename << ";"; // get all the pedestals and noises
00338     TSQLiteResult* result = (TSQLiteResult*) server->Query(query.str().c_str());  // get the result of this query
00339     query.str(""); // clear the stringstream after use
00340 
00341     TSQLiteRow* row = (TSQLiteRow*) result->Next(); // get the first row
00342     while (row != NULL) {
00343       //      std::cout << row->GetField(0) << " " << row->GetField(1) << " " << row->GetField(2) << " " << row->GetField(3) << " " << row->GetField(4) << std::endl;
00344       run_number = row->GetField(0);
00345       detname = row->GetField(1);
00346       bankname = row->GetField(2);
00347       pedestal = row->GetField(3);
00348       noise = row->GetField(4);
00349 
00350       fOneSigmaValues[IDs::channel(detname)] = atof(noise.c_str());
00351       
00352       delete row;
00353       row = (TSQLiteRow*) result->Next(); // get the next row
00354     }
00355     delete result; // user has to delete the result
00356   }
00357   else {
00358     std::cout << "Error: Couldn't connect to SQLite database" << std::endl;
00359   }
00360 }
